#summary Coordination of the Delalande project

= Introduction =

The aim of the project is to edit a book with the entire work of Michel-Richard Delalande


= List of works =

From the catalogue of Lionel Sawkins

  * S.1 : _Dixit Dominus_ (1680, first version) [http://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Psaume_110_(109) Psalm 110(109)]

  * S.6 : Ad te levavi oculos (1683, 1689) [http://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Psaume_123_(122) Psalm 123(122)] [http://imslp.org/wiki/Ad_te_levavi_oculos,_S.6_(Lalande,_Michel_Richard_de) IMSLP]
